meanings.definition: A prescription medication used for weight loss.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed phentermines to help with my weight loss journey.
meanings.sent2: Many people have successfully lost weight with the help of phentermines.
meanings.sent3: I guess I'll have to start calling my vitamins 'phentermines' if I want to sound fancy.
meanings.sent4: The bottle of phentermines was like a magic potion, promising a slimmer figure.
meanings.sent5: The word 'phentermines' stuck in my mind, a symbol of hope for a healthier me.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of phentermines, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent2: She ordered multiple bottles of phentermines to last her through the year.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought too many phentermines, now my cabinet is overflowing!
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the scent of various phentermines, each with its own purpose.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were stocked with colorful phentermines, a rainbow of weight loss possibilities.
